title: Front Fork - Inspection

body.body: Thoroughly clean and examine all components for damage, wear, scoring, corrosion. The condition of the bushes and damper rod piston ring (where fitted) is very important. Renew the components as necessary.
Always renew the damper rod bolt sealing washer (where fitted), oil seal, dust seal and seal circlip every time the fork is dismantled.
Always renew the bushes if the fork inner and outer tubes have been separated.
